subtests.name: Can set 'border-top-color' to CSS-wide keywords
Can set 'border-top-color' to var() references
Can set 'border-top-color' to the 'currentcolor' keyword
Setting 'border-top-color' to a length throws TypeError
Setting 'border-top-color' to a percent throws TypeError
Setting 'border-top-color' to a time throws TypeError
Setting 'border-top-color' to an angle throws TypeError
Setting 'border-top-color' to a flexible length throws TypeError
Setting 'border-top-color' to a number throws TypeError
Setting 'border-top-color' to a position throws TypeError
Setting 'border-top-color' to a URL throws TypeError
Setting 'border-top-color' to a transform throws TypeError
'border-top-color' does not supported 'red'
'border-top-color' does not supported '#bbff00'
'border-top-color' does not supported 'rgb(255, 255, 128)'
'border-top-color' does not supported 'hsl(50, 33%, 25%)'
'border-top-color' does not supported 'transparent'
